Tiffany:
Want to get a Hero power?
You need to take 1st place at the Olympics.
Thanks to this event I can give You the weapon, which contains the power of a hero.
To get it, pick up the Weapon Sealed Power Hero and use subject specific skills.
While in Your inventory have to be the Scroll of the Hero Power.
To use the Weapon the Character's Strength, can not, do not, therefore, think carefully before using. Be careful!
